summary: Replaces many enchantments with better ones. I.e Animations and particles
descriptionHtml:
[color=#0066FF][center][size=5]See Enchantments v4.9 [/size][/center][/color]
By: SpiderAkiraC

[color=#0066FF][size=3]Important![/size][/color]
I will be still working on this whenever I can. This will now be a open source for anyone to use.
Been very busy and will not be modding very much.
If you wish to donate to me I ask of you not to. All I need is the moral support, thank you :)

Just want to thank you guys again for 1000 endorsements!!!!!10/06/14(My Birthday :D) Thank you Winters323 for the 1000th endorsement!! Thanks so much everyone!

Also on Steam Workshop!

SeeEnchantments is a project I just started after work. I was playing around with the Magic effects, EffectShaders and Object Art and 3 coffees later SeeEnchs was born!
If you don't know already SeeEnchs creates visible enchantments that replace the vanilla ones. Witch I wasn't a big fan of.

[color=#0066FF][size=3]Whats new?[/size][/color]
Vanilla Enchs just glow...
My Enchs have animations and particles. See screenshots

[color=#0066FF][size=3]Compatibility:[/size][/color]
-This enchantment mod is not compatible with others that replace the weapon Enchs, however egocarib has made a great mod that lets you mix and match enchantments from other mods together definitely check it out!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56614/?]Enchanted Arsenal[/url]

-Is compatible with Dragonborn and Dawnguard.


-There is a small bug however that may happen. The sound of effect might loop when sheathed. This is the game bug not from my mod. The only way to fix it is load to an event before the looping.

[color=#0066FF][size=3]Working on:[/size][/color]
Sizes (2h Weaps, Greatswords, Daggers Maces/Axes)
Pre enchanted weaps with two enchs. (fire-frost, fire-lightning, lightning-frost, etc)
Better bow effects
Armour Edition
Suggestions are welcome!
(also if anyone wants me to make a custom enchantment I will be happy to take it on)

[color=#0066FF][size=3]Install:[/size][/color]
Simply put the "Data" folder in your Skyrim directory

[color=#0066FF][size=3]Uninstall[/size][/color]
Delete the .esp files
Delete the .bsa files

Hope you enjoy this mod!
and thanks for downloading!
-Cheers

Please check out my other mods!
||||
VVVV
  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1354307/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My other mods[/url]

Version History:

v4.6 (The pointless update)
Changed bow's fire effect
Tweaked fire effect (still working on)
Animated all other enchantments

v4.7
I dont remember what I did, think I changed up some shaders

v4.8(The king Arthur Update)
Added new fire effects
Added absorb health effect
Added absorb stamina effect
Added absorb magic effect
Added soultrap effect
Added TurnUndead effect
Added fear effect
Added green ench effect (damage stamina, paralyze, poison)
Added blue ench effect (damage magic)
Tweaked lightning effect (now covers the weapon)
Tweaked frost effect (frost clouds are a little thicker and smaller)
Tweaked bow fire effect
Tweaked effect shaders for all enchs
Removed "crazy fire" effect (Working on that one still)

v4.9(update)
Changed absorb health effect
minor fixes

Tools used:
Creation Kit
TES5Edit
Nifskope
PhotoshopCC
BSA Browser
author: SpiderAkiraC
